text: pratishthit maheena baraabar hai pratishthit mahine ke, aur samast pratishthaon ka bhee baraabaree ka badala hai. atah jo tumapar zyaadatee kare, to jaisee zyaadatee vah tum par ke, tum bhee usee prakaar usase zyaadatee ka badala lo. aur allaah ka dar rakho aur jaan lo ki allaah dar rakhanevaalon ke saath hai
